input_email_body:
Subject: Trouble with Billing Discrepancies in Subscription Services

Noticing discrepancies in the billing for my subscription services You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.. The issue might be due to incorrect payment processing through Xero. After re-verifying my account details and reprocessing payments, the problem still persists. I would greatly appreciate your timely assistance in resolving this matter My name is Maria Gonzalez.. Could you please let me know the next steps to take to resolve the issue? I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.
